long_description: The Black Diamond Cobra/Viper Android leash is designed specifically for use with the new Black Diamond Cobra and Viper ice tools. Leash connects cleanly to the shaft of the tool with a threaded insert. Quick-release clip frees up your hands for tool-free moves and pro placement. Wrist strap adjusts for comfortable support.
short_description: The Black Diamond Cobra/Viper Android leash is designed specifically for use with the new Black Diamond Cobra and Viper ice tools.
